Name: Mirai Fury MX
Description:
Manufacturer: Mirai
Focus: Snub Bomber

Featuring best-in-class maneuverability and fully integrated, cutting-edge Xi’an tech, the next-generation Fury MX snub bomber from Mirai uses its twenty halo-mounted missiles to devastate targets during short-range space combat.
